aekiro_dialog.name: Dialog
aekiro_dialog.description: Makes a sprite/9patch/tiled background object behave like a dialog.

open-animation-tweenning.name: Open Animation Tweenning
open-animation-tweenning.desc: Tweening function of the opening animation.

open-animation-duration.name: Open Animation Duration
open-animation-duration.desc: The duration of the open animation.

open-sound.name: Open Sound
open-sound.desc: Sound to play when the dialog opens.

close-animation-tweenning.name: Close Animation Tweenning
close-animation-tweenning.desc: Tweening function of the closing animation.

close-animation-duration.name: Close Animation Duration
close-animation-duration.desc: The duration of the close animation.

close-sound.name: Close Sound
close-sound.desc: Sound to play when the dialog closes.

close-button-name.name: Close Button Name
close-button-name.desc: The Name of the close button

is-modal.name: Is Modal
is-modal.desc: If modal, buttons underneath can not be clicked.

ondialogopened0.description: Triggered when the dialog is opened.

ondialogclosed1.description: Triggered when the dialog is closed.

isopened2.description: True if the dialog is opened.

target_x0.name: Target X
target_x0.desc: Target X of the dialog. Ignored if center = yes.

target_y1.name: Target Y
target_y1.desc: Target Y of the dialog. Ignored if center = yes.

center4.name: Center
center4.desc: Automatically center in the viewport. TargetX/Y will be ignored.
